item.title: 沙特人入股阿斯顿-马丁 F1 深化了海湾地区对体育运动的影响
item.description: 迈凯轮车队的队友兰多-诺里斯（Lando Norris）和奥斯卡-皮亚斯特里（Oscar Piastri —）以及红牛车队的马克斯-维斯塔潘（Max Verstappen —）将在本周末的阿布扎比站为车手冠军展开三方争夺。【原文：After a thriller in Qatar, Formula One’s 2025 season has come down to the final race of the season this weekend in Abu Dhabi, where McLaren teammates Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri — along with Red Bull’s Max Verstappen — will face a three-way battle for the drivers’ title.】

item.title: 瑞士放宽武器出口规定以扶持国内国防企业
item.description: 瑞士将放宽对武器出口的严格规定，这对因俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰而失去业务的瑞士国防工业来说是个好消息。【原文：Switzerland is set to relax strict rules on weapons exports, a relief for its defense industry which has lost business in the wake of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 英国央行调查显示：英国企业预计工资将增长 3.8%
item.description: 英国央行的一项调查显示，英国公司预计明年将把工资提高 3.8%，这很可能会加剧一些利率制定者对通胀胶着的担忧。【原文：UK companies expect to increase wages by 3.8% over the next year, according to a Bank of England survey that’s likely to fuel concerns among some rate-setters about sticky inflation.】

item.title: 中国乐观情绪推动新兴市场股市升至两周高点
item.description: 周四，外国投资者对中国股市的乐观情绪提振了新兴市场股票基准指数，推动其创下自11月17日以来的最高收盘价，并有望连续第二周上涨。由于投资者在等待美联储下周的政策决定，货币汇率持稳。【原文：Foreign-investor optimism about Chinese stocks lifted the emerging-market equity benchmark on Thursday, pushing it toward its highest close since Nov. 17 and putting it on track for a second straight weekly gain. Currencies were steady as investors awaited next week’s Federal Reserve policy decision.】

item.title: 数据显示，英国改革协会第三季度筹集资金超过 1,000 万英镑
item.description: 在加密货币投资者克里斯托弗-哈伯恩（Christopher Harborne）900 万英镑（约合 1200 万美元）捐赠的推动下，奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）的英国改革党在第三季度获得了比其他任何英国政党都要多的捐款，这表明商界和富人正在认真对待该党在民调中的领先地位。【原文：Nigel Farage’s Reform UK raked in more donations that any other British political party in the third quarter, boosted by a £9 million ($12 million) gift from crypto investor Christopher Harborne, in a sign business and the wealthy are taking the party’s polling lead seriously.】
